original: Eklund, Per Gustav Ragnar, fil. mag., läroverksadjunkt, Göteborg, f. 18/2/06 i Sthlm av bokhåll. August E. o. Gustava Forsmark. G. 42 m. Irma Sandahl. — Stud:ex. i Södertälje 25, fil. mag. i Upps. 29, provår v. södra latin i Sthlm 34. Vik. adj. i Skellefteå 30, i Falun 31-33, e. lär. i Falun 33, v. östra real i Sthlm 35, vik. adj. v. södra latin där 35-37, adj. i modersm. o. hist. m. samh:lära v. Vasa h. a. 1. i Gbg sed. 37. Sekr. i Modersm :lär. fören. i Gbg’sed. 40 o. i Gbgs lär:-sälisk. sed. 41.
translated: Eklund, Per Gustav Ragnar, MA, high school teacher, Gothenburg, born on February 18, 1906 in Stockholm to bookkeeper August E. and Gustava Forsmark. Married Irma Sandahl in 1942. He obtained his studentexamen (high school diploma) in Södertälje in 1925, MA from Uppsala University in 1929, did his probationary year as a teacher at Södra Latin in Stockholm in 1934. He was a substitute teacher in Skellefteå in 1930, in Falun from 1931-1933, and then a permanent teacher in Falun in 1933. He taught at Östra Real in Stockholm in 1935 and was a substitute teacher at Södra Latin from 1935-1937. He became a permanent teacher of Swedish language, history and social studies at Vasa högre allmänna läroverk in Gothenburg in 1937. He was secretary of the Modersmålslärarföreningen (Association for Teachers of the Mother Tongue) in Gothenburg from 1940 and of Göteborgs Lärarförening (Gothenburg Teacher's Association) from 1941 onwards.
